title: Summer Skincare Tips for Ghana's Climate
excerpt: How to keep your skin hydrated, protected and glowing through the hottest months — with vegan products that work.
body:
Ghana's heat and humidity can be tough on skin — but with the right routine and vegan products, you can keep your complexion hydrated, protected and glowing all season.

1. Hydrate from within and on the surface

Lightweight, non-comedogenic moisturisers work best. Look for formulas with hyaluronic acid and plant-based oils that absorb quickly without leaving a greasy film.

2. Sun protection is non-negotiable

Use a broad-spectrum SPF every day, even when it's cloudy. Mineral sunscreens with zinc or titanium dioxide are gentle and effective for melanin-rich skin.

3. Simplify your routine in the heat

Stick to cleanse, treat, moisturise and protect. Avoid heavy layers; let your skin breathe while still getting the actives it needs.
